short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your ChatGPT experience with the ChatGPT Helper - GPTab Chrome Extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your ChatGPT experience with the ChatGPT Helper - GPTab Chrome Extension! Unlock the power of GPT-3.5 Turbo for smarter interactions, customize your chat interface with vibrant colors, and declutter your view by hiding long chats.

Key feature:

- Integrated GPT-3.5 Turbo assistant: Enhance your chat input with the power of GPT-3.5 Turbo. Press the "Tab" key while typing a message to get suggestions and guidance from the OpenAI API, without leaving the chat interface.
To get started, simply install the extension and visit chat.openai.com. When you're ready to utilize the GPT-3.5 Turbo assistant, press the "Tab" key while typing your message in the chat input field. Make sure to set your OpenAI API key in the extension options for a seamless experience.

- Customizable colors: Personalize your chat experience by changing the colors of specific elements on the page.

- Hide long chats: Toggle the option to hide long chat messages, making them collapsible with a "Show more/Show less" button for better readability.
